19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

chapter.ara-name: باب
باب الْخُرُوجِ إِلَى الْعِيدَيْنِ مِنَ الْغَدِ
chapter.eng-name: Going out for the two 'Eids the (morning of the) following day

chapter.ara-name: باب خُرُوجِ الْعَوَاتِقِ وَذَوَاتِ الْخُدُورِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Adolescent girls and women in seclusion going out for the two 'Eids

chapter.ara-name: باب اعْتِزَالِ الْحُيَّضِ مُصَلَّى النَّاسِ
chapter.eng-name: Menstruating women keeping away from the place where the people pray

chapter.ara-name: باب الزِّينَةِ لِلْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Adorning oneself for the two 'Eids

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ قَبْلَ الإِمَامِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying before the imam on the day of 'Eid

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ الأَذَانِ لِلْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Not saying the Adhan for the two 'Eids

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Khutbah on the day of 'Eid

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ قَبْلَ الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: 'Eid prayer before the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ إِلَى الْعَنَزَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Offer the 'Eid prayer facing an 'Anazah (a short spear)

chapter.ara-name: باب عَدَدِ صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: The number (of rak'ahs) in 'Eid prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ بِـ { ق } وَ{ اقْتَرَبَتْ }
chapter.eng-name: Reciting "Qaf" and "(The Hour) has drawn near." in the 'Eid prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ بِـ { سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الأَعْلَى } وَ{ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ }
chapter.eng-name: Reciting "Glorify the Name of Your Lord the Most High" and "Has there come to you the narration of the Overwhelming?" on the two 'Eids

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُطْبَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Khutbah on 'Eid after the prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُطْبَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ بَعْدَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Khutbah on 'Eid after the prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّخْيِيرِ بَيْنَ الْجُلُوسِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ لِلْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Giving people the choice whether to sit and listen to the 'Eid Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب الزِّينَةِ لِلْخُطْبَةِ لِلْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Adorning oneself for the 'Eid Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُطْبَةِ عَلَى الْبَعِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: Delivering the Khutbah from atop a camel

chapter.ara-name: باب قِيَامِ الإِمَامِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam standing during the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب قِيَامِ الإِمَامِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ مُتَوَكِّئًا عَلَى إِنْسَانٍ
chapter.eng-name: Imam standing during the Khutbah, leaning on another person

chapter.ara-name: باب اسْتِقْبَالِ الإِمَامِ النَّاسَ بِوَجْهِهِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam turning to face the people during the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِنْصَاتِ لِلْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Listening attentively to the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ الْخُطْبَةُ
chapter.eng-name: How the Khutbah is to be delivered

chapter.ara-name: باب حَثِّ الإِمَامِ عَلَى الصَّدَقَةِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam urging (the people) to give charity

chapter.ara-name: باب حَثِّ الإِمَامِ عَلَى الصَّدَقَةِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam urging (the people) to give charity

chapter.ara-name: باب حَثِّ الإِمَامِ عَلَى الصَّدَقَةِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam urging (the people) to give charity

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقَصْدِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Moderation in the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب الْجُلُوسِ بَيْنَ الْخُطْبَتَيْنِ وَالسُّكُوتِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Sitting between the two Khutbahs and remaining silent while sitting

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ الثَّانِيَةِ وَالذِّكْرِ فِيهَا
chapter.eng-name: Recitation and remembrance during the second Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب نُزُولِ الإِمَامِ عَنِ الْمِنْبَرِ، قَبْلَ فَرَاغِهِ مِنَ الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam coming down from the minbar before finishing the Khutbah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَوْعِظَةِ الإِمَامِ النِّسَاءَ بَعْدَ الْفَرَاغِ مِنَ الْخُطْبَةِ وَحَثِّهِنَّ عَلَى الصَّدَقَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Imam exhorting the women after finishing his Khutbah and encouraging them to give charity

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ قَبْلَ الْعِيدَيْنِ وَبَعْدَهَا
chapter.eng-name: Praying before and after the 'Eid prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب ذَبْحِ الإِمَامِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ وَعَدَدِ مَا يَذْبَحُ
chapter.eng-name: Imam offering a sacrifice on the day of 'Eid and the number (of animals) he may slaughter

chapter.ara-name: باب ذَبْحِ الإِمَامِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ وَعَدَدِ مَا يَذْبَحُ
chapter.eng-name: Imam offering a sacrifice on the day of 'Eid and the number (of animals) he may slaughter

chapter.ara-name: باب اجْتِمَاعِ الْعِيدَيْنِ وَشُهُودِهِمَا
chapter.eng-name: When two 'Eids come together (when 'Eid falls on a Friday) and attending them both

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ عَنِ الْجُمُعَةِ، لِمَنْ شَهِدَ الْعِيدَ
chapter.eng-name: Concession allowing those who attended 'Eid prayer not to attend jumu'ah

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ عَنِ الْجُمُعَةِ، لِمَنْ شَهِدَ الْعِيدَ
chapter.eng-name: Concession allowing those who attended 'Eid prayer not to attend jumu'ah

chapter.ara-name: باب ضَرْبِ الدُّفِّ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: Beating the Duff on the day of 'Eid

chapter.ara-name: باب اللَّعِبِ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الإِمَامِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: Playing in front of the Imam on the day of 'Eid

chapter.ara-name: باب اللَّعِبِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ وَنَظَرِ النِّسَاءِ إِلَى ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: Playing in the masjid on the day of 'Eid and women watching that

chapter.ara-name: باب اللَّعِبِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ وَنَظَرِ النِّسَاءِ إِلَى ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: Playing in the masjid on the day of 'Eid and women watching that

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الاِسْتِمَاعِ إِلَى الْغِنَاءِ وَضَرْبِ الدُّفِّ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession allowing listening to singing and beating the duff on the day of 'Eid
